class.name: B4R::B4RSHT20
class.comment: Include the SHT20 library headr located in the same folder as rSHT20.h

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the I2C Connection to the SHT20 module. Example (Private sht As SHT20): End If

method.name: Measure
method.comment: Perform measurement; returns true if successful.

method.name: Temperature
method.comment: Get the temperature after Measure called.

method.name: Humidity
method.comment: Get the humidity after Measure called.

method.name: Dewpoint
method.comment: Get the dewpoint after Measure called.
